alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 1:37PM EDT until July 13 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 215 PM EDT. * At 136 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over North Gouverneur, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Canton, Lisbon, De Kalb, Parishville, Colton, Rensselaer Falls, Morley, Norwood, Hermon, Chipman, Heuvelton, Waddington, Richville, Madrid, Pierrepont, Russell, De Peyster, West Parishville, and West Potsdam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
